name: HindiRhymes
0:
”Alexa, play hindi rhymes”
”Alexa, open hindi rhymes”
”Alexa, ask hindi rhymes to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hindi rhymes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The easiest way to teach your kids is to sing them rhyme which is easy to remember.
Make your children learn the rhymes that you grew up listening. But as you can't remember all of them, Alexa can play them for you.
If a parent wishes to start teaching Hindi to his/her child, it’s always wise to start with Hindi rhymes
Hindi Rhymes also make children fun time more entertaining and useful.

Please use the following example phrases when using Hindi Rhymes

Alexa, play Hindi rhymes
Alexa, open Hindi rhymes
Alexa, ask Hindi rhymes to play

If your facing any issues or need any improvements to the skill, please leave valuable feedback to us so it will really help us in updating the skill or leave us a review if you're enjoying our skill so it would help us in reaching a larger audience.
priv:
